page.title: 07Arts & Crafts,S'key & C'thrp
page.content:
{Arts:}Live music less important than before; at least 10 painters, 4 photographers, 1 architect, 1 interior designer and decorator (includes decoration of fine furniture), 1 textile designer, 3 or 4 writers.
{Crafts}include: antique restoration, building in flint and brick, joining, paint- spraying, plumbing. Cockle, mussel and lug-worm gathering are ancient crafts. Black-smithing has recently ceased.
{Specialised interests:}bee-keeping, bridge, cookery, crochet, cross-words, D.I.Y., horticulture (Tibetan blue poppy was introduced locally and has hybridised), jam and wine-making, knitting, needle-point, sewing, spinning; study of: archeology, local history, birds, insects, wild flowers.
